title: YMI Women's Hyperstretch Mid-Rise Skinny Jeans, Black, XL
description: Flattering mid-rise skinny fit hugs curves in lightweight, hyperstretch fabric that maintains shape
Comfort of leggings meets style of fitted jeans with faux front pockets, zip fly and belt loops
Versatile black wash wears casually or dressed up for any season
Easy care - just machine wash cold for a fresh look every wear

Join the hype today and find the perfect pair of mid-rise skinny jeans! Our unique hyperstretch fabric was designed to highlight and define your natural curves all day long while providing you with day-long comfort and style. Our shape-defining, lightweight stretchy, soft fabric will have you moving freely all day long. At YMI it is our mission to promote body positivity and inclusivity by providing a wide selection of sizes and styles, check out our plus size selections today! Meet our best-selling Hyperstretch Mid-Rise Skinny Jeans! Made with a body-hugging, lightweight, extremely stretchy fabric the midrise skinny jeans will have you feeling stylish and comfortable all day long. Our innovative hyperstretch fabric will hug your waist and maintain its shape along your legs throughout the day! Available in plus sizes and a variety of colors find your perfect body-hugging, curve-defining stretchy skinny jeans today. Why give up style for comfort when you can have them both? Our hyperstretch skinny jeans are designed to provide you with the day-long comfort of leggings while giving you the style of modern y2k-inspired fitted skinny jeans. The mid-rise skinny jeans feature faux front pockets, single-button with zip closure, and belt loops, making them the perfect casual weekend jeans or comfy skinny work jeans. The lightweight, flexible fabric makes the hyperstretch jeans very versatile and wearable all year long. Mid-Rise Skinny jeans are perfect for any occasion, wear these jeans on a busy Monday morning or a casual Sunday afternoon. The skinny fit makes these flexible, stretchy jeans perfect to style with an oversized band tee and sandals for a casual lightweight summer look or with a corset and heels for a night look. However, you decide to style these jeans you will feel effortlessly comfortable all day long! Wash and care: The mid-rise hyperstretch skinny jeans for women are machine wash safe! Our durable, stretchy, body-hugging fabric allows for easy and hassle-free care! Simply machine wash cold and you are set!
